text_block_list.text:
The Selection Race. An opportunity for horsegirls 
to tout their abilities to prospective trainers.

Whenever its time nears, one can find many 
horsegirls buckling down to training.

Among them, one horsegirl stood out 
through her peculiar demeanor ——

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Curtains rise tonight, on whom but 
my own gleaming Victory Road.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
To put a name to this show — yes, "T.M. Opera O's 
Prelude to Prestige" sounds most suitable indeed.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Heh… Just imagine how splendid of a story will unfold ——

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: The thought alone has me hearing the fanfare of angels!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: All which leaves me is to await my dear audience ——

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Alas… perchance training occupies their minds, 
but not a soul has passed by.

This peculiar, even eccentric, horsegirl stood in the 
deserted central plaza, conversing with herself.
choice_data_list: (… What in heavens is going on with her?)
(… What in heavens is going on with her?)

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: —— Oh now?
The moment that thought crossed my mind, our eyes met.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Oooh!! Welcome, welcome, how delightful of you to join me!!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Heheh, I know precisely what are you are here for. It is to delight in my opera, is it not?

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Screenplay by yours truly! Direction by yours truly! 
Starring — in lead role — yours truly! An operatic tour 
de force, played by a most extravagant cast.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Waste no further time, take your place on that bench over there. …… Ahem, let us begin ——

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: —— Hm? What bothers you?
choice_data_list: Why are you performing an opera…?
Why are you performing an opera…?

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Heh… What a foolish question.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
In three days, I will appear in a "Selection Race", 
you understand? This is a significant event with an 
impact across the whole academy.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Creating further excitement for the race is precisely why 
I am performing my opera, as it's eve celebration!
choice_data_list: I thought the eve is on the day before…?

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Oh dear, what a curious thing you state. 
Whoever decreed that eve celebrations 
should take place the day before?
choice_data_list: I also want to point out the sun in the sky…
I also want to point out the sun in the sky…

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Ha-ha-ha-ha! Now wherefrom do you have the idea that eve celebrations must transpire at night time?

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: How preposterous to let common sense chain you this way.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
For I am a king among kings! In other words, 
one might call me "The Era's High King"!!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: To a high king, time of month or day are but trifling matters. …… Heh, has comprehension set in yet?
choice_data_list: I am at loss for words……

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Hm, perhaps it was premature to expect you to 
comprehend the grand ideology of yours truly.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: No matter, you are still the momentous first attendee of mine.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Feast your eyes on a splendiferous performance by yours—— Hm?

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
…… Hold a moment. Could not that be a trainer's badge 
I see pinned upon your figure?

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Heh…… hahah… ha-ha-ha! Haaa-ha-ha-ha-ha-haah!!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Most marvelous! Yours truly happens to be 
in search of a trainer! To accompany me on 
the Victory Road, you understand!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
What would this be but fate! You, having been enchanted by 
my opera, make for the perfect candidate!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Please step forth and grasp my hand! 
Don't be shy now!!
choice_data_list: Quite something to spring on me…!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Oh dear, do you find it too daunting to become my trainer?

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
I empathize completely. Even the heart of yours truly 
beats faster upon observing herself in the mirror.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
In that case, I have a proposition for you. What say you to 
starting as my provisional trainer until the Selection Race, 
so that you may sort out your thoughts?

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
We can take our time getting to know each other 
in these days before the race!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Yours truly will neither run nor hide! Take all the time 
you need to familiarize yourself with my glow!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Haa-ha-ha-ha-ha! The stage of our Victory Road is coming into view, my dear trainer!

She wouldn't pay me any attention whenever 
I tried talking about it afterward…
As a result, I had become T.M. Opera O's provisional trainer……
